issue.message: Did you mean `@get:VisibleForTesting` ? Without `get:` this annotates the constructor parameter itself instead of the associated getter.
The API level is already known to be at least 21 here from outer annotations
issue.errorLine1: @RequiresApi(21) // TODO(b/200306659): Remove and replace with annotation on package-info.java
